title: Opinion | Look Who's Rushing Covid Vaccines Now
author: Allysia Finley
description: The FDA authorized the new 'bivalent' mRNA shots without any trials of their efficacy or analysis of their risk.
cleaned_text: Democrats and the public-health clerisy denounced President Trump for rushing Covid vaccines. They've been curiously quiet about the Food and Drug Administration's gunshot approval last week of revamped booster shots with no trials showing they are safe or effective.
